text: Indian Bank offers all in one mobile banking application for the customers with several enhanced features providing all banking facilities at a single platform.
It enables user to perform major banking operations through the application on 24*7 basis anywhere and anytime without visiting the branch.  It also offers many value added services.
Every transaction is authenticated through transaction password- MPIN set by the customers.
